attributes.action: Completely ban polygamy in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Polygamy is illegal in the UK.  The taking of more than one spouse at the same time is bigamy in British law.

I therefore petition the Prime Minister to completely ban the practice of polygamy in the UK; to include refusing to admit immigrants and wives who are in polygamous 'marriages' into the UK.

In addition, all support for polygamous 'marriages' through the welfare system should cease immediately.
